description: Mytales lets your imagination run free. Write your own story with AI collaboration, complete with images. Take charge of your own world where anything goes
title: MyTales - AI Powered Story Generator
introduction: MyTales is a storytelling platform that offers AI-generated story sections for users to create and share their stories. The platform provides different pricing tiers for users based on their needs, ranging from a free plan to a premium plan with advanced features. Users can access basic AI models, story sections per day, and quality images based on their selected plan. Additionally, there is an option for a one-time purchase for extended access to the platform.
pricing: The pricing for MyTales ranges from a free plan with basic features to a premium plan at $19.99 per month. There is also an option for a one-time purchase of 12 months of Bard level access for $99.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a free plan available with basic AI model and 5 story sections per day.

faqs.question: What is included in the Bard plan?
faqs.answer: The Bard plan includes 300 story sections per day, the highest quality AI model, the ability to store stories forever, and the option to share stories publicly or privately.
